lead_paragraph: A nation's hopes of Olympic glory can be a burden for the toughest of athletes but few can know of the pressure that befalls badminton's world number one Lee Chong Wei.

headline.print_headline: Badminton: Nearly-Man Lee to Carry the Burden for Malaysia Again
headline.main: Badminton: Nearly-Man Lee to Carry the Burden for Malaysia Again
